DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Wheelchair Mounted Robotic Arm
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose project , evaluate effect wheelchair mount robotic arm ( WMRA ) improve functional independence veteran SCI . The study determine ability perform marker task within follow four category improve 4 week training period use robotic arm : 1. activity daily live , 2. vocational task , 3. advance task , subject-specific task . The secondary purpose project follow : 1.Does quality life ( life satisfaction health status ) improve 4 week period use WMRA ? 2 . What perceive advantage WMRA veteran SCI ? Additionally , study evaluate following : 1 ) ease installation usefulness instructional manual ; 2 ) training requirement ( time , task ) ; 3 ) safety feature ; 4 ) reliability device ; 5 ) home , community , vocational application ; 6 ) user acceptability ; 7 ) maintenance/ service ; 8 ) portability ; possible modification .
